Html:
Hi,

i am using GMap.NET WPF Version. Can anybody suggest me how to create selection shapes like Rectangle which is already built in for selection of markers in map.

i want to include selection shapes like Square,Circle etc.,

 

Regards,

Balaji

Hi Radioman,

 

Thanks for quick reply. Can you please brief me a bit on the above i couldn't able to get. please provide sample code if any and if possible. To be more precise on my requirement i need some thing like the below URL

http://www.geoxmf.com/gmap/client/gmap.jsp

 

Regards,

Balaji
there is one dynamic interaction of circle is demo, but not very optimal...

Hi Radioman,

The circle you mean is by using Circle.xaml which i believe created as marker overlay. But i want similar to Rectangle selection Holding shift key and on mouse move drawing rectangle and selecting a group of markers.

Please correct me if am overlooking.

Regards,

Balaji

Hi,

waiting for reply. It's urgent please let me know how to process drawing of circle by holding shift key similar to Rectangle.

In GMap we have a class GPolygon through which they pass arguments for drawing circle,Polygon etc., on mouse move as done in the above URL is there anything like that?.

Regards,

Balaji

Radioman really great!.

Ok. How to process if suppose we need something like "free Hand" tool for selection.

Regards,

Balaji
